Reviews.Title: Be aware that this product has changed!
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: These cameras work very well as security devices and are reliable and easy to set up. I have two in place. I ordered this as an additional camera and the design has been changed. There is now a fan on the power unit of the camera which makes a noticible noise. This may not be a problem if the camera is placed out of the way somewhere but would be heard if it is in a public/ open area.

Reviews.Title: Love This Camera!!
Reviews.Author: MomtoSam
Reviews.Content: I am a working mom with two small children that are with a nanny for three days a week.  I bought these cameras to be able to see what was happening in my house during the day while I was away.  I LOVE them!!  I can log in from my computer at work and see what is happening in four different rooms.  I can check my son's nursery to see if he is sleeping when its suppose to be nap time.  I can look into the living room to make sure the TV is off when its suppose to be.  I feel much more connected to them during the day and more secure knowing that I can see them and can "supervise" just a bit even though I can't be there all the time. The cameras were very easy to install - which is a plus for me since I'm not particularly techno literate.  Would recommend these to anyone!

Reviews.Title: WiLife Security Camera
Reviews.Author: J.W.
Reviews.Content: Works well. I have indoor cameras looking outdoors through my windows, keeping an eye on my entry ways. I have motion detection recording enabled. Night vision is adequate if you have bright outdoor lights. 2 problems I encountered were, the need to delete recorded images atleast every 24 hrs {you can save segments} to keep your computer hard drive from being strained and WiLife system only works when computer is on. If you shut down your hard drive, WiLife is also shut down.

Reviews.Title: Simple installation
Reviews.Author: twd65
Reviews.Content: This product is very simple to install and use. The color clarity is also very good. During the day it does fine looking outside, but the "night vision" is lacking.

Reviews.Title: Great unit....but the fan noise drives me nuts
Reviews.Author: RT "Gadget Guy" "gadget guy"
Reviews.Content: I like this system a lot for the fact that it works as described. I have it looking out my front window to track people coming to the front door. I only found a few problems:- It seems to activate to record clips even though the motion sensed is outside the area set up in the software. I excluded the road but it still records every car that drives by.- I had it set up to email me a snapshot when it sensed motion. It worked for a while but it stopped. I guess I have to sign up for the Platinum service?- You have to sign up for the service to zoom control the camera remotely and to be able to watch recorded videos remotely.- Lastly, the most important problem. The power adapter has a fan that is very audibly noisy. It's pretty annoying, about as noisy as my Playstation 3. Sometimes the fan pick up dirt and moans even more.

Reviews.Title: I love these things.  Have 4 cameras now for 6 months.
Reviews.Author: M. Barnett "nonartist, but wannabe"
Reviews.Content: I love this system.  I live in a large house.  So far there are 4 cams.  3 are inside, one outside.You may have to unplug/plug you main USB thing at the computer a couple of times during initial installation of cameras or software install.  But after that, it's worked flawlessly.I even have another power-line network going at the same time.I use these inside cameras suctioned cups to windows pointing outside.  They do really well in my opinion and the software is great.  Online viewing is cool too.I work downstairs and it's a long ways up to the front door.  I have a camera on the second floor that point down the driveway.  I get a pop-up when the mail truck goes by, a car drives into the driveway, etc.  It's FANTASTIC that I don't have to come running or won't miss a doorbell.At night, I've caught bats flying around outside.However...... I would NOT recommend it for business use where you need to report exactly what a person's faace is to the police... or need to make out a license plate number.I'm planning on adding more outside cams as they get slightly better pictures, especially at night.  It'll even detect the motion of birds or squirrels if you set it up that high.So, overall, I can't recommend it enough except that perhaps it's a little expensive but looking at what you get I think it's more than worth it.

Reviews.Title: Nice but abit touchy & comes with setbacks
Reviews.Author: KAREN "DarnRedhead"
Reviews.Content: Logitech Wilife was extremely easy to install! But with this system you must have a computer/laptop running at all times (also called the Command Center). Leaving this Command Center running constantly will also periodically have messages pop up or laptop to overheat. If that happens your connection is lost. I usually lose connection daily so I reboot my Command Center every morning before leaving. Yet I still lose connection daily, don't know why Logitech has Command Center issues, but they do. Another problem is the cameras are very touchy. I went through 3 of them before finding a working camera. They overheat easily and you lose your streaming picture due to this periodically as well. I can't get the record streaming/record motion detection to work so that probably means I need to purchase monthly monitoring service through Logitech, which I don't want to do. But, with these setbacks the picture is nice except no night vision unless you purchase separately, which means you must buy a regular camera $140+ then buy the night vision lens $140+ rendering your first purchase to buy the shell since you remove the regular optics to the night vision optics. Very poorly thought out by Logitech. The only plus is the easy of installation, other than that I have now purchased a wireless IP, PTZ camera so it is more versitile and covers more of one area unlike a stationary camera. Hindsight, I would not have purchased this product. Logitech needs to go back to the drawing board.

Reviews.Title: Great product - reasonable price
Reviews.Author: S. M. Kaplan "smkcpa"
Reviews.Content: I have 3 cameras set up in my office - I can now monitor the activity in my surroundings while I am working. These cameras do a great job!!

Reviews.Title: Home Security system
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: The best all around product for home security surveillance we found. Most folks have an old computer that they haven't gotten around to throwing away or recycling and this product makes perfect use of that old computer. Our neighborhood was having crime problems so we got 4 cameras and hooked them up to an old dell. Had to upgrade the video card but they are cheap and easy to install. Police came and viewed some of what we captured and eventually they caught the burglars. Also bought another system to remotely monitor the caregivers for my 90 year old mother. Don't buy refurbished cameras. They aren't as good as new ones. GREAT product!

Reviews.Title: Improvement?
Reviews.Author: Michael L. Willis
Reviews.Content: These cameras were great.  I bought one for gifts for several people and they loved them.  Now a fan has been added to the power supply.  This is a serious problem and needs to be addressed.  No one wants to constantly listen to a fan at every camera.

Reviews.Title: Received used or refurbished
Reviews.Author: Navie Dunne
Reviews.Content: The camera I received was used, or refurbished. It was not in Logitech original packaging, and does not perform like two others of identical make/model. The footage is grainy and jumpy, and I just had the computer running the program upgraded with new memory. I shifted this camera to the spare bedroom to use only on the once-per-month visit of the house cleaner. Also this camera has the newer power supply like my #2 camera, but the fan doesn't run.Otherwise I find the Wilife system good, and reliable enough. I don't think hardwired systems are any more reliable and these are easy to move around--just plug them in. I basically watch my cats during the day and keep tabs on the maid. Using this system I found one cat nanny lied to me about coming every day when I was on vacation (thanks for leaving my cat without food for 36 hours) and another showed up at 4:00AM and skulked through my kitchen with a flashlight like a prowler (just plain odd)

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: DHR
Reviews.Content: Good value for the money.  I have 1 outdoor and 2 indoor cameras and all work well.  The zoom is not as clear as I thought, but for the money it is fine.  The alert system is great, sends email with a picture when something or someone passes in front of the cameras.  Very easy to install and set up.  I used an older laptop with window XP on it and this system was compatible with it.  The product was shipped and arrived in a timely manner.  I find Logitech products to be very user friendly, dependable and a good value.

Reviews.Title: Compatability
Reviews.Author: John Laughlin
Reviews.Content: Note that this camera is compatible with all old models, but to get it to work properly with your installed units, you will probably need to do a paper-clip rest on the camera's bottom.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Outdoor camera and 2 indoor cameras. They all work well. Easy install and easy computer software. Auto brightness tends to give the best picture. Must have some light to get a decent picture. Do not expect it to work in "No" light situations.

Reviews.Title: So, So...not always reliable
Reviews.Author: Martin Pichinson "shrwood"
Reviews.Content: Concept is great. It seems there is never a software update to fix some of the problems. I have five cameras. Three work all the time, the fourth....most of the time and the fifth almost never. I have had new parts, wires, etc. but it just does not work.I would try another brand...I am looking into other options now.

Reviews.Title: Good, but has compatibility issues.
Reviews.Author: J. Jeffreys "Designer"
Reviews.Content: I already had a WiLife camera, and the original was incredibly simple to set up. The new one is slightly different from the one I already had, however, and seems to have caused a conflict. When I first installed it, neither camera could be detected at all, and after several hours of trial and error (which included updating my software) I got the new one working. I still can't connect to my original camera.If you buy this camera, I suggest you buy all the cameras you plan to use at the same time, to make sure you don't run into problems adding new ones down the road.

Reviews.Title: Logitech Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard P. Apgar "Ricoman"
Reviews.Content: I am an Electronics installer. This is perfect for the average guy/girlTook me about 30 min to install and set up 2 camera at my 2nd home on the lake

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: pen
Reviews.Content: I added this on to my system about a year ago and it still works fine as does the original camera that came with the system about 4 years ago.

Reviews.Title: Easy and dependable
Reviews.Author: Leslyn Weathers
Reviews.Content: Already had the master system and wanted to increase my coverage so this add on was the ticket. Simple to use, added coverage without moving to a new provider.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: J. Nielson "John Nielson"
Reviews.Content: Won't work with WIndows 8. Worked on Windows 7 for a couple of months, now can't do online viewing. Logitech support said they know about the problem and are working on it. 2 months later, still doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: WORKS GOOD
Reviews.Author: bjprez
Reviews.Content: This works very well. Just wish it was night time visible. It would be perfect. I will be looking to buy more for the system

Reviews.Title: Returned
Reviews.Author: jdm
Reviews.Content: I had tried to hook up this unit to my computer but found out that it does not support Windows 8 yet so I sent it back since that is what I have.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: T_Shields
Reviews.Content: All in all I will start off by saying this is a good product. It's really inexpensive comparatively since it's not really sold new anymore and it works - it's a camera, you can see things, it records. There are some bells and whistles that you have to pay for, which would have dropped it down to four stars. What made me go with three is that we had a power outage and when the power came back and I restarted my computer, the Wilfe software isn't recognizing the cameras anymore. So I'll probably have to unplug them and do the whooole process over.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: Reil
Reviews.Content: Made for my older version of the software, and has excellent picture quality.  Easily plugs into any outlet. Fully adjustable lens makes it even adaptable to a corner plug near the floor.

Reviews.Title: Logitech WiLife Digital Video Security--Indoor
Reviews.Author: Hendry Chirinos
Reviews.Content: I Buy Logitech WiLife Digital Video Security - Indoor Add-On Camera for use in my business and see what happens in and out while in my job .. are very good and work very well, only one thing I do not like is that they work on 32bit OS (I use 64-bit OS), but the rest are very good and fast, I recommend them!They are in perfect condition and are the same as those shown by Deals On Wheels, excellent! Seller

Reviews.Title: easy to install
Reviews.Author: Roberto Cabanas "Roberto"
Reviews.Content: good quality and easy to install. you can view it through internet so it works fine in order to check your house or office

Reviews.Title: Logitech add on camera
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to replace an older camera that no longer worked. It arrived in brand new condition and worked properly right away. While I like the ease of setting up the Wilife security system, the cameras seem to fail after two years. I have replaced 5 of the six I originally purchased. This includes the clock cameras, outdoor cameras, and indoor add on.I do not know if the new versions of the cameras are any better or if they are even compatible with master system I now use.

Reviews.Title: GREAT SERVICE
Reviews.Author: sully
Reviews.Content: SEEING AS THESE ARE HARD TO BUY IT WAS GOOD TO SEE YOU CARRIED THEM. AGAIN I HOPE THIS WILL DETER THE THEFTS

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: CHESTER G. JONES
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, it is a great addition to my system, i added it to my existing surveillance camera, works great.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Sapronetti "JJS Diversified Services"
Reviews.Content: I have had these for around 5 years now and they still work good. The video is good but nothing like the new HD cameras from Logitech. Don't know if you can buy these anymore but if you need inexpensive internet cameras these work fine, but if you can spend a little more, get the new HD Logitech system and cameras.

Reviews.Title: Logitech In-Door Camers
Reviews.Author: Fred Ferguson
Reviews.Content: I ordered and installed this new Logitech WilLife Indoor add-on Camera after I installed the Master System. I have enjoyed it so much I upgraded my service to the Platinum Service. I ordered this add-on Indoor Camera from Amazon because I wanted a new Indoor Camera to add to my other two, and they had such a good price on the item. It was purchased through Electronics Expo. I appriciate Internet ordered items having a tracking number for follow-up, and this one did. The item shipped and was delivered as promised. It is up and working and with no problems.I would recommend to anyone who wants an in-expensive motion activated security system to seriously look at the Logitech WilLife Camera system.

Reviews.Title: Innovation, Price and Ease of Use Outweigh Limitations
Reviews.Author: ITP404
Reviews.Content: This is one of the most innovative and affordable gadgets I've ever encountered! Low price, ease of use and installation earn this home security system five stars. No tools or hard wiring required. Just plug the camera(s) into any wall outlet and it communicates with your PC through your home's electrical wiring. My system has already captured a burglary in progress at a neighbor's house. And I believe the flashing lights on my window-mounted (attached by suction cup) cameras have deterred thieves from my own home. The only downside I've run into is durability. Two of my six cameras have failed within three years of use. However, the cost of replacing them is far less than what I would have paid for systems of equal (or in many cases less) quality. So, I consider it an ongoing "maintenance cost." The advantages of this system far outweigh its drawbacks. I still give it five stars and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Kim
Reviews.Content: This camera is on the pricey side but works great in the WiLife system. Picture quality is excellent.  Easy set-up & system recognition with a number of mounting options.  I've hard mounted a camera to the bottom of a floor joist and am also using the suction cup for a window-mounted camera.  I'm still waiting for it to fall off the window for the first time.

Reviews.Title: solid performer
Reviews.Author: hh "hh01"
Reviews.Content: This device works very well.  I hooked it up to my system and have been happy with the results.  As little bonus I didn't expect is that there are three small green lights on the side. At night, I like seeing the tiny lights so I can orient to the room without turning on overheads (dimmer than a nightlight, but just enough so you don't go bump in the night).

Reviews.Title: If you have Windows 7 don't buy this
Reviews.Author: I_want_the_real_chubby
Reviews.Content: If you have a system running XP, it might work, but if you have a Windows 7 system it becomes a paperweight. I have made multiple attempts at contacting Logitech and all I have received are links to the latest version of software that runs on XP. Logitech is not supporting this product so save your money.

Reviews.Title: worse than no security
Reviews.Author: KDWarwick "kdwarwick"
Reviews.Content: For this first couple of weeks this seems like it is a good product, then the truth hits you: this thing is unreliable. My PC has plenty of memory and CPU power, but the software randomly stop recording and the camera has to be rebooted by sticking a pencil in a hole on it. Then it will record again...for a while... before it stops again. My wife had her tires stolen in the driveway under the nose of this less than awesome security device. This is the only time I've felt strongly enough about a product to write a negative review. I wish I could have my money back. Please do not fall under the false sense of security that this shoddy product offers.

Reviews.Title: What a dud
Reviews.Author: Kenny-double-U
Reviews.Content: I rated this item low because it didnt work.  I called the Logitech tech support and we were not able to resolve the issue.  My rating is not a reflection of the product because I have several of these same cameras and they work fine.

Reviews.Title: Indoor camera
Reviews.Author: Katrina M. Capasso "Kat"
Reviews.Content: We already had the outdoor cameras set up, so this was easy to do.  We use it inside of a barn on our llamas and it is wonderful!  It's actually pretty good in bad lighting too.  We use a light during nighttime, little bit more than a nightlight is good on them so they can sleep.

Reviews.Title: frist Version of Logitech WiLife Digital Video Security--Indoor Add-On Camera
Reviews.Author: Moises
Reviews.Content: i Chose to give 1 star Because of bad Customer service with the seller who Refuse to give us a Refund without every Mention he's Return Policy to me and  deny a refund without giving me a Specific reasons for refusing a refund.this product is a Great Security camera also please  keep in mind theirs a newer Version of Logitech Digital Video Security camerai recommend this product but not from is seller We git stuf.

Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Junk. 3 of 5 cameras I bought have failed within 1 year. WiLife web viewing site is down most of the time. Trouble with older and newer cameras(700e and 750i) that have replaced the flawed originals.
